TIM-3被确定为阿尔茨海默氏病的有前途的治疗靶标TIM-3是与后期发作的阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）有关的免疫和炎症的免疫检查点分子，但迄今为止其在大脑中的作用尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tim-3------- as-as-as-promising-therapeutic-therapeutic-target-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tim-3-sideified-as-promisision-therapeitic-therapeitic-target-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45EA9C48-8E33-4DBB-B40E-9F5AE75D​​8D24 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:44:50 -0400 Tim-3 identified as promising therapeutic target for Alzheimer's disease
新的Stitchr工具为基因治疗提供了有前途的一步大规模杨百翰将军和贝丝以色列执事医疗中心的研究人员开发了Stitchr，这是一种新的基因编辑工具，可以将治疗基因插入特定位置而不会引起不必要的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new- stitchr-tool-worlers-a-promisish-spromising-step-forward-forward-forward-for-gene-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-stitchr-tool-counters-a-promising-step-forward-forward-forward-forward-for-for-gene-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e93abab-101A-459C-961E-45202BC72FA5 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:40:25 -0400 New STITCHR tool offers a promising step forward for gene therapy
苏黎世的ETH研究人员确定了涉及DNA修复基因之间的冗余研究人员的人类细胞的DNA由约31亿个构件的序列组成。细胞竭尽全力维持这种庞大的信息的完整性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/eth-zurich-researchers-sideify-nistify-redundancies-between-the-the-the-gen-genes-genesinvolved-in-dna-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/eth-zurich-researchers-sideify-nistify-redundancies-between-the-the-the-gen-genes-genes-involved-in-dna-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=445bd545-6c81-4496-8245-e89112a0a50d Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:31:46 -0400 ETH Zurich researchers identify redundancies between the genes involved in DNA repair
月经周期可能会导致镰状细胞病女性的炎症根据今天在血管，血栓形成和止血性血管，在月经周期的卵泡期，与炎症，C反应性蛋白有关的标记可能会显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/menstrual-cycle-may-drive-infive-inflammation-in-women-women-with-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/menstrual-cycle-may-drive-infive-inflammation-infive-in-women-women-with-with-sickle-cell-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f388888A9999-906E-4B4D-AB5E-B5E-B296279DF12E Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:21:55 -0400 Menstrual cycle may drive inflammation in women with sickle cell disease
Mirvie揭示了对怀孕高血压疾病的生物学理解的新进步今天，Mirvie宣布了一项在自然传播中发表的突破性研究的结果，揭示了包括妊娠高血压疾病（HDP）的生物学理解的新进展，包括先兆子痫 - 孕产妇发病率和死亡率以及早产的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/mirvie-reveals-new-advances-in-the-the-biological-rolidate-rastical-rascending of-typertengendiond-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/mirvie-reveals-new-advances-in-the-the-biological-rolidate-rastical-rastanding of-hepertengendive-disorders of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83f674c7-a289-4735-a64444444444444444444444-85ff9e87ea05 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:17:54 -0400 Mirvie reveals new advances in the biological understanding of hypertensive disorders of pregnancy
即使在平凡的活动中，大脑也反映了政治隶属关系一项新的研究表明，当人们进行平凡的琐事（例如购买食物）时，他们的政治隶属关系可以显示出他们的大脑活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/political-corlitication-cretlection-reflected-in-the-the-brain-even-during-mundane-activities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/political-anclitation-criliate-reflected-in-the-the-brain-even-during-mundane-activities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0829f3c2-72d9-487d-9c04-7dc16fb15350 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 15:12:49 -0400 Political affiliation reflected in the brain even during mundane activities

手持电震动可能会破坏起搏器和心脏设备研究发现，通常用于自我防御的手持电击器可能会与心脏病制造商等心脏植入电子设备（CIEDS）相互作用，从而使个人处于危险之中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/handheld-electro-shockers-may-diss-disrupp-pacemakers-and-hendt-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/handheld-electro-shockers-may-diss-diss-pacemakers-and-hernt-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=346dc3a8-aba7-4db2-bc01-3796b5b76414 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 14:57:07 -0400 Handheld electro shockers may disrupt pacemakers and heart devices
增加了与气候模式变化有关的过敏症状喉镜上发表的一项综述表明，气候变化对花粉季节和浓度的影响有助于提高过敏性鼻炎或花粉症的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/increased-allergy-symptoms-tied-to-changing-changing-climate-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/increased-allergy-symptoms-tied-to-changing-changing-climate-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51CA72A2-7CF7-494E-97AD-939416586D6B Wed, 09 Apr 2025 11:44:36 -0400 Increased allergy symptoms tied to changing climate patterns
